title: DFPD Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for Assistant Professor Posts
description: Department of Food & Public Distribution (DFPD) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Assistant Professor Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the Post Graduation, Ph.D, can grab this chance and apply for the DFPD Recruitment 2025 . Here, we mentioned the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply on or before the last date of ...
